title: High Privacy, Local Operation, and Open Source
text: Nostradamus not only prioritizes your privacy and offers fully local operation capabilities but also stands as an open-source beacon, inviting collaboration and fostering innovation. Choose your preferred Large Language Model (LLM) like GPT-4 (Turbo), GPT 3.5, Claude Opus, Gemini, DBRX, Llama2, Mistral, OpenChat, or others to tailor Nostradamus precisely to your project's needs.

section.title: Why Local?
section.content: Operating locally ensures the utmost privacy and security for your codebase, eliminating external data transmission concerns.

section.title: Flexibility and Choice
section.content: Select from a vast array of cutting-edge LLMs to customize Nostradamus for your unique development environment.
